definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Far dream cross-stitch using imported raw materials, quality assurance.
sentences.chinese: 遠夢十字繡採用進口原輔材料，品質保證。

sentences.english: Finally the Cross-stitch has been finished after almost one months hardworking.
sentences.chinese: 經過將近一個月的奮戰，我的十字繡作品終於完工了。

sentences.english: Men are involved in designing and bringing you som e of the great cross-stitch patterns.
sentences.chinese: 男性參與設計和您帶來的一些偉大的十字繡模式。

sentences.english: Hardanger can be com bined with cross stitch tom ake a beautiful piece of work.
sentences.chinese: 哈丹格爾可以與十字繡結合使工作。

sentences.english: Why Not Cross Stitch a Fantasy Dragon?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不十字繡幻想龍？

sentences.english: Geometry, a fun and easy colour stitching technique.
sentences.chinese: 十字繡，一種充滿樂趣和顏色的針繡體驗。

sentences.english: A cross stitch is an x -shaped embroidery stitch.
sentences.chinese: 阿十字繡是一種X形繡花針。

sentences.english: One of the most popular and easy to use fabrics for cross stitch is Aida fabric .
sentences.chinese: 最流行和易於使用的十字繡面料之一是阿伊達面料。

sentences.english: The elongated cross stitch is a variation of the cross stitch that replaces two single cross stitches.
sentences.chinese: 拉長的十字繡是十字繡取代兩個單交種針的變化。

sentences.english: The elongated cross stitch is a variation of the cross stitch that replaces two single cross stitches.
sentences.chinese: 拉長的十字繡是十字繡取代兩個單交種針的變化。
個別用2股線繡十字繡繡法。

sentences.english: If you have done cross stitch, it is a bit easier to understand some crochet designs.
sentences.chinese: 如果你做了十字繡，這是一點容易理解一些鉤針設計。

sentences.english: This is a si m ple tutorial on the basic stitches used in cross stitch.
sentences.chinese: 這是在用十字繡的基本針簡明教程。

sentences.english: She cross-stitched a beautiful crane scene to present to Mr. & Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們就收到了一個繡着白鶴的美麗的十字繡。

sentences.english: Belong to cross-stitch into larger embroidery.
sentences.chinese: 屬於十字繡中較大的繡品。

definition: spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
(usu used in the negative) to be of importance or to matter/to be in the way/to be a hindrance
lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water/fig. to make love
to come to blows/to paw/to grope/to get fresh
see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
lit. the soul of a deceased has not yet dispersed (idiom)/fig. the influence still lingers on/the spirit (of some doctrine) is still alive
to follow bad examples/to be corrupted by bad examples
